attributes.action: Mental health and autism and special needs, and the incarceration of my son ATUs
attributes.additional_details:
Autism is not a crime and not A Mental illness,together we stand to the injustices done to our children and our families,We say.No More ATUs and no more deaths at the hands of strangers and no accountability
Prime minister David Cameron,Alister Burt MHMinster,Simon Stephens CEO NHSJane Cummings Head of NursingNHSE.Social Servies for all LondonSocial,S For all England,we are petitioning all hereTo listen to us and give us our children,set us families with care care packages and appropriate homes.
attributes.background:
https://www.change.org/p/nhs-islington-bring-my-son-stephen-home-care-for-him-in-our-community-bringstephenhome
Mums and families campaigning for the human rights of their special needds at ATUS

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because we're not sure what it is asking the UK Government and Parliament to do. You could start a new petition calling clearly for the specific action you want the Government or Parliament to take.
